nodes.text: Herra Ros was a female engineer who, during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, wished to defect from one faction to the other. She offered information in exchange for an annual salary.
The mission is available to members of both fractions in the game Star Wars: The Old Republic. Consequently, Herra defects to either the Empire or the Republic depending on the player's fraction.
